name: ZigbangSmartDoorlock
0:
”Alexa, unlock my door lock”
”Alexa, what is the status of my door lock?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
[Notice] As 'Zigbang' completed acquisition of 'Samsung SDS’ home IoT business, you can access all features of 'Samsung Smart Doorlock' through 'Zigbang Smart Doorlock' now.

If you have Zigbang Smart Doorlock (Wi-Fi communication), you can experience various services anytime and anywhere with Alexa, including checking the door lock condition of your home, unlocking and locking doors with the door lock
※ This feature is available with the IoT service pack (for Wi-Fi), which can be separately sold.



To use Alexa to control Zigbang Smart Doorlock, you need to follow below procedures

1) Install and sign up Zigbang Smart Doorlock app 

2) Sign in Alexa app and find Zigbang Smart Doorlock skill

3) Insert Zigbang Smart Doorlock account information in Alexa app

4) Enable “Voice command” in Zigbang Smart Doorlock app

5) Enable "Unlock by voice" and create your voice code in Alexa app 

 

Now you can control Zigbang Smart Doorlock with Alexa as below

1. Real-time check the status of door opening with the door lock

 “Alexa, is the front door locked?”

2. Remote control of door unlocking/locking with the door lock

 “Alexa, lock my door.”
